questions.question: What is the function of collimator in spectrometer?
Angular dispersion of a prism means.......

answers.a: Sum of the deviations between two colours.
answers.b: Difference of the deviations between two colours.
answers.c: Angle between reflected ray and refracted ray
answers.d: Angle between the direct ray reading and minimum deviation.
